item.title: Changing Character looks (M,F) & Changing general store selling items !HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Zerk Owner Zerk
item.description:
@Owner_Zerk wrote:

First, look for this.

		if (command.startsWith("kick"))

What that is, is your ‘kick’ command. What that does is boot people off of the server. [Note. This is only the top of the kick command]

Now, under the whole kick command add this.

} else if(command.startsWith("char")) { showInterface(3559);

Basically what that does is open the interface 3559 (The box which changes what your character looks like.)

You should be set to go. Just type in ::char in-game and you should get an interface.

  • Owner Zerk -

Read full topic
